column1: Appendix table 17. Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense, 2000, 2007, and 2008
Authors: William J. Sabol, Ph.D., Heather C. West, Ph.D., and Matthew Cooper
Appendix table 17: Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense, 2000, 2007, and 2008
Note: Based on prisoners with a sentence of more than 1 year. All data are for September 30 from the BJS Federal Justice Statistics Program.
a/Includes murder, negligent and non-negligent manslaughter.
